featureTitle: Live stream on your website with Facebook Live.
featureSubTitle: Do you live stream from Facebook?  Would you like be able to auto-embed Facebook Live on your website? Well, you’ve come to the right place!

featureList.title: Live on your website
featureList.description: With VidLive, you can auto-embed Facebook Live directly on your website. Get started right away!

featureList.title: One Time Embed
featureList.description: No more wasting time updating embed codes every time you want to go live. Embed once and stream live every time.

featureList.title: Last Live Placeholder
featureList.description: Show your previous video when you are not live. Always have your previous video ready to play on your website.

featureList.title: Placeholder Image
featureList.description: Want to add your own custom image placeholder when you are not live on Facebook? No problem, you can do that.

featureList.title: Automatic Start
featureList.description: With VidLive, There is no page refresh required, your live stream starts automatically in less than 5 seconds after you go live.

featureList.title: Distraction Free
featureList.description: There are a lot of distractions on Facebook. Keep your audience focused on your website and Facebook Live video.

howToTitle: How to embed Facebook Live on your website:
howToSubTitle: Start live streaming Facebook Live on your website in 3 easy steps

hoToSteps.title: 1. Connect
hoToSteps.description: Use your Facebook account to securely connect your Facebook Page with VidLive.

hoToSteps.title: 2. Embed
hoToSteps.description: Simply add your one time embed code to the webpage you want to stream live to. Works with virtually any website or CMS.

hoToSteps.title: 3. Go Live
hoToSteps.description: Go Live from your Facebook Page... watch your Facebook live video stream automatically on your webpage.

whyTitle: Why embed Facebook Live on your website?

whyFeatureList.title: Reach more website visitors

whyFeatureList.title: Time Saver
whyFeatureList.description: Stop wasting time updating embed codes every time you want to go live. Embed once and stream live every time.
